name: Country
comment: Contains a valid list of geographical areas, namely, countries, which are recognized as independent political units in world affairs. For example, Canada, India, US and so on.
vf short description: Contains a valid list of geographical areas, namely, countries, which are recognized as independent political units in world affairs. For example, Canada, India, US and so on.

fields.name: CountryKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the country in ALDM. Each country key value represents a unique country. Generated Key based on Country Id

fields.name: CountryDesc
fields.comment: Name of the country. shortLabelDisplay//Customization Instruction: Check the actual column name during implementation

fields.name: CountryId
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the country in the source system. country

fields.name: CountryCode
fields.comment: Specifies the country code used in the telephone numbers of the corresponding country. country

fields.name: CountrySourceId
fields.comment: Indicates the country code used to refer the country. For example, US for USA, AL for Albania and so on.

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
